body:
Using sunny as an example just wanted to know if the veteran rank was prestige in every gamemode or max?

Edit: someone might want to fix the Avicade glitch if its still there.
body_tagged:

title: Quick question

replies.body: Yes, i think you need prestige 5 in all gamemodes.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, i think you need prestige 5 in all gamemodes.

replies.body: Veteran rank was a thing. I am unaware whether or not it is still a thing with the new prestiges.
replies.body_tagged: Veteran rank was a thing. I am unaware whether or not it is still a thing with the new prestiges.

replies.body: As dooz said, I think it was planned like a year ago, but it's never been given out, and doesn't exist anymore.
replies.body_tagged: As dooz said, I think it was planned like a year ago, but it's never been given out, and doesn't exist anymore.
